reviewText: I got this DVD for my husband who likes Ronald Regan. He was very happy with it. And I would reamend it to any one who likes Ronald Regan.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Let the Noam Chomsky fans continue to live in thier idyllic (yet bitter) ersatz-Upotia that exists only in thier private, unattainable fantasyland. This is a wonderful set for all Reagan fans who admired and respected the man and the way he was able to turn the country around from the doldrums and despair of the toothless Carter administration and reminded us all what made this country great.It's also nice to have more complete clips of Reagan's most famous moments and not just the "best-of" highlight clips that we've seen a million times.Buy it...watch it...live it again. Who knows when we'll see a man of this vision and greatness again.
summary: Ignore the vitriolic rant down below...
Title: N/A

reviewText: I Just received a new and sealed copy of the 2 disc set. Fortunately both discs were included (I  gather many only received one) but the 2nd DVD is horribly defective  with only about half of the bonus material able to be accessed. It seems MPI Home Video have not done a very good job of recalling  the bad product and replacing them.  BE AWARE!
summary: 2009 and still this product is defective...
Title: N/A

reviewText: We bought this as a gift for a friend who loves everything 'Reagan'.He thinks it is great. Seven and one half hours of Reagan. WOW. I can't say it is my thing, but he loves it.So I guess that means I can recommend it :)
Title: N/A

reviewText: I strongly recommend this wonderful box set to everyone - Reagan fans and even them who are liberals and anti-Reagans. I also thank those people who worked so much to make us richer by this item. All the vital speeches are  here and this is a must see title for this generation and the generations  to come.
summary: BEST OF THE BEST, MUST-HAVE SET FOR ALL REAGAN FANS
